clinic_details.q: What are your clinic's hours of operation?
clinic_details.a: Our clinic is open from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM, Monday through Friday. We are closed on weekends and major holidays.
We are located at 123 Health St, Wellness City, 90210. You can find us on the 3rd floor of the Medical Arts Building.
Yes, there is a dedicated patient parking garage attached to our building. Parking is free for all patients. Please bring your parking ticket for validation.

insurance_billing.q: What insurance providers do you accept?
insurance_billing.a: We accept most major insurance providers, including Blue Cross Blue Shield, Aetna, Cigna, UnitedHealthcare, and Medicare. We also accept self-pay patients.

insurance_billing.q: What payment methods can I use?
insurance_billing.a: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, Amex), debit cards, and cash. Payment is due at the time of service unless other arrangements are made.

insurance_billing.q: Can you explain your billing policies?
insurance_billing.a: We will bill your insurance provider directly for your visit. You are responsible for any co-payments, deductibles, or non-covered services. Your co-pay is due at the time of your visit.

visit_preparation.q: What documents do I need for my first visit?
visit_preparation.a: For your first visit, please bring a valid photo ID (like a driver's license), your insurance card, and a list of any current medications you are taking.

visit_preparation.q: What should I bring for my appointment?
visit_preparation.a: Please bring your photo ID, insurance card, and any relevant medical records or test results. If it's a follow-up, please bring your medication list.

policies.a: We require at least 24 hours' notice for all cancellations. Appointments cancelled with less than 24 hours' notice may be subject to a $50 cancellation fee.

policies.q: What happens if I'm late for my appointment?
policies.a: We have a 15-minute grace period. If you are more than 15 minutes late, we may need to reschedule your appointment to ensure our doctors can stay on schedule for all patients.
We require all patients and staff to wear masks inside the clinic, regardless of vaccination status. We also practice social distancing in waiting areas and sanitize all rooms between patients.
